rules_text:
[i]Fire Sorceress [/i]– When Lilina, Delightful Noble enters, you may create a Sorcerer Role token attached to up to one target creature you control. [i](If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has “Whenever this creature attacks, scry 1.”)[/i]
[i]Thunder Bearer[/i] – Whenever you surveil or scry, put a charge counter on Lilina.
[i]Promote[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, if Lilina has three or more charge counters on her, transform her.
